itemDisplayName: Add client VMs to existing deployment v1.0
description: This template deploys a 5-tier base environment with an AD domain, SQL, SharePoint, app servers and Windows 10 VMs joined to the domain. Time to deploy: 20-50 minutes. See https://aka.ms/DTL-5-tier-AD-base for details.
summary: This template provisions x number of client VMs to an existing deployment and joins them to the deployment's domain. See https://github.com/oualabadmins/DevTest/tree/master/templates/add-clients for details and deployment guidance.
